annotations: Costumer Service / Sales experience for the last 25 years, including all activities of marketing, lead generation product presentations. Dynamic public speaking and presentational skills pertaining to product knowledge and industry demands.
Coordinator of Local and overseas logistical methods of distribution for automobiles sold.
Procurement specialist of vehicles for the inventory level in an auction style environment and internet purchasing.
Developed guidelines for new sales representatives on selling techniques and job duties.
Responsible for all legal activities involving product liability and warranty coverage’s.
Developed an inventory system in order to increase product available of automobiles.
Responsible for all the internet sales and export coordinator.
Evaluated manual report from Superintendents and did comparison with live-track, monthly reporting to the prospective cities, in order to allocate labor cost per project.
Auditor of Payroll totals across projects in South Florida; submitted certified payroll reports to various cities for reimbursement.
Conducted daily site visits to oversee project to follow up progress and adjustments.
Responsible for collecting daily individual reports pertaining to Public Work’ Department across various cities in South Florida.

Placed weekly bids across city projects with corporate approval; Miami Dade, Bal Harbour, Sweetwater, Miami Beach, South Miami, Pinecrest, Medley, Opa-Locka, Hialeah, Hallandale Beach, City of Coral Gables and Homestead.

Director in the development of domestic and international B2B sales, account members included body shops, mechanic shops, corporate dealerships, insurance appraiser’s, export companies and general public.
Responsible for increasing annual sales in more than 175% in the first 3 year period.
Expanded for clientele list from 165 to over 300 accounts with innovative techniques consisting of promotional strategies and volume discounts.
Primary controller of company’s fixed overheard, consisting of a $35,000 monthly budget with over 30 account payables.
Coordinator of local and overseas logistical methods of distribution for products sold.
Procurement specialist of vehicles for the inventory level in an auction style environment and internet purchasing.
Excel, Microsoft Word, and Internet Explorer.
